title: Trump pardons Democrat Henry Cuellar, claiming Biden political attack
description: In his latest pardon, the US president claimed Biden targeted Congressman Cuellar for his criticism of US border policy.
content:
United States President Donald Trump has pardoned Democratic US Congressman Henry Cuellar, claiming he had been targeted by the administration of former President Joe Biden.
